# MonsterUI 

> MonsterUI is a python library which brings styling to python for FastHTML apps.

Things to remembers when using MonsterUI:
- While Pico CSS is commonly used in FastHTML apps, that is *completely incompatible* with MonsterUI. 
- MonsterUI is *not* compatible with FastAPI syntax and is not targeted at creating API services.

## Docs
- [Tailwind](https://gist.githubusercontent.com/Isaac-Flath/7b978e1ae099074c838b66738c7bbee2/raw/90efebd4152f988a8d46eb865bd15b3902f1d288/Tailwind%2520Cheat%2520Sheet.md)
- [MonsterUI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AnswerDotAI/MonsterUI/refs/heads/main/monsterui/core.py)

## API
- [API List](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AnswerDotAI/monsterui/refs/heads/main/lib_nbs/apilist.txt): A succint list of all functions and methods in fasthtml.

- [Authentication](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AnswerDotAI/monsterui/refs/heads/main/docs/app/auth.py)
- [Cards](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AnswerDotAI/monsterui/refs/heads/main/docs/app/cards.py)
- [Dashboard](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AnswerDotAI/monsterui/refs/heads/main/docs/app/dashboard.py)
- [Forms](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AnswerDotAI/monsterui/refs/heads/main/docs/app/forms.py)
- [Mail](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AnswerDotAI/monsterui/refs/heads/main/docs/app/mail.py)
- [Music](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AnswerDotAI/monsterui/refs/heads/main/docs/app/music.py)
- [Playground](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AnswerDotAI/monsterui/refs/heads/main/docs/app/playground.py)
